snippet.title: FDC teaser
snippet.description:
Fly. Die. Cry. is now available for free on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bekindgames.nolimit 
and App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1145761703

Are you old school? Longing for the days of simplicity and arcades? Plagued by a goldfish-like attention span?
Fly. Die. Cry. might be for you…if you can remember to download it. You can pick it up and put it down easily and it doesn’t require a lot of time. We’re not saying you’re the type of person to game while you’re on the toilet, but if you are…well, we’ll keep you entertained.

We’ve kept it simple. There aren’t a lot of bells and whistles - just various shades of blue and grey (no, not 50 shades you perv).

With just a bit of hand-eye coordination and some focus, you can master the game. All you have to do is place your finger anywhere on the screen and steer your ship, avoiding walls and obstacles. The better you become, the better your ship becomes.

All you need to get started is this app (finger not included). Enjoy!

FEATURE LIST:

• Over 50 unique levels that are going to make you cry!
• Turbo Mode for people looking for a tougher challenge
• Unlockable characters 
• A leaderboard so you can see how you rank against your friends

Warning: side effects may include uncontrollable sobbing, leaking from the eyes (aka tears), irritability and frequent gaming trips to the bathroom during working hours
